title: Plaice with anchovy potatoes & cherry tomatoes

ingredients.item: 300g Charlotte potatoes, scrubbed and cut into chunks if large
3 anchovy fillets, from a jar or can
2 plaice fillets, each about 200g, skinned if liked
½ bunch salad onions, trimmed and sliced diagonally
3 tbsp essential Waitrose Low Fat Vinaigrette

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Cook the potatoes in boiling, lightly salted water for 6-7 minutes until tender. Finely chop the anchovy fillets and put in a bowl with the garlic and oil. Mash the ingredients together with the back of a spoon.

Drain the potatoes and tip into a roasting tin. Add the anchovy mixture and mix well. Fold the plaice fillets in half and add to the roasting tin. Bake for 15 minutes. Add the salad onions, tomatoes and oregano to the tin, turning them with the potatoes and bake for 5 minutes.
Transfer the fish and potatoes to plates. Add the vinaigrette to the tin, stirring in any anchovy and garlic mixture. Drizzle over the fish to serve.
